Info.Title: The Monuments Men
Info.Writer: George Clooney (screenplay), Grant Heslov (screenplay), Robert M. Edsel (book), Bret Witter (book)
Info.Actors: George Clooney, Matt Damon, Bill Murray, Cate Blanchett
Info.Plot: An unlikely World War II platoon is tasked to rescue art masterpieces from Nazi thieves and return them to their owners.
Info.Language: English, German, Russian, French, Flemish, Dutch
